name: @team-plain/typescript-sdk
description: Typescript SDK for Plain's Core GraphQL API with lazy loading

scripts.codegen:doc: graphql-codegen -c codegen.doc.js && node comprehensive-fix.js && node add-missing-fragments.js
scripts.codegen:sdk: graphql-codegen -c codegen.sdk.js && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); let c=fs.readFileSync('src/_generated_sdk.ts','utf-8'); c=c.replace(/\[object Object\]/g,'string'); fs.writeFileSync('src/_generated_sdk.ts',c);"
scripts.codegen: pnpm codegen:doc && pnpm codegen:types && pnpm codegen:sdk
